org.schema.schine.network

Class NetUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.schema.schine.network.NetUtil

  • public class NetUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to register and pull network objects and standards.

    • Field Summary

      • COMMAND_SUCCESS_DO_NOTHING

        public static final byte[] COMMAND_SUCCESS_DO_NOTHING
        A byte[] of the length 1. The standard value is -3.

      • WAIT_TIMEOUT

        public static final long WAIT_TIMEOUT
        The time to wait for a client's response to a PING before the connection is reset. Specified in milliseconds. 60000L
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final int SOCKET_BUFFER_SIZE
        The size of the data-buffer of a java.net.Socket 1048576
        See Also:

      • addCommandPath

        public static void addCommandPath(java.lang.String path)
        Adds all commands at the specified location to the CommandMap
        Parameters:
        path - the path to look for classes.
        See Also:
        commands, CommandMap.addCommandPath(String)

      • addSendableClass

        public static void addSendableClass(java.lang.Class<? extends org.schema.schine.network.objects.Sendable> clazz,
                    java.lang.Class<?>... array)
        Registers a new Sendable class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to register. It must extend Sendable.
        array - the parameter array of the constructor to use. It must only be StateInterface.class, or the JVM will be shut down.

      • assignCommandIds

        public static void assignCommandIds()
        Assigns the IDs to all commands.

        public static org.schema.schine.network.objects.Sendable getInstance(byte b,

                                                     org.schema.schine.network.StateInterface stateInterface)
        Returns the instance of a received Sendable
        Parameters:
        b - the ID of the Sendable
        networkStateContainer - unknown
        stateInterface - the stateInterface to use as parameter
        Returns:
        the received Sendable

        public static java.lang.Class<? extends org.schema.schine.network.objects.Sendable> getSendableClass(byte b)
